headline: Vertex Pharmaceuticals: Buying The CF Fortress For The Journavx Optionality
summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals is backed by CF dominance and JOURNAVX optionality, with key catalysts ahead for growth and upside. See why VRTX stock is a buy.
